content: घृताची {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Greasy, abounding in ghee. {@--2@} Containing water. {@--3@} Shining. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Night. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Sarasvatī. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of an {%apsaras%}; <ls>N. 2. 109</ls> (the following are the principal nymphs of Indra's heaven; घृताची मेनका रंभा उर्वशी च तिलोत्तमा . सुकेशी मंजुधोषाद्याः कथ्यंतेऽप्सरसो बुधैः).
